Title: To wage revolution one must rely on Mao Zedong Thought
Designer: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Publisher: General Department of the Chinese People's Liberation Army (中国人民解放军总参谋部)
Notes: Vertical on the left a Mao quotation: "Revolutionary war is a people’s war, only by mobilizing the people can one wage war, only by relying on the masses can one wage war".The slogan on the right of the quotation: "Prepare for battle".Nr. 3 of the set 'Posters showing measures against atomic, chemical and bacterial warfare' (1971).
